name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Asana display project name in boards

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the project name in Asana boards, as requested here:â€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display the project name in Asana boards, as requested here:
https://forum.asana.com/t/see-project-name-on-each-task-on-board-view/109104/71

It works by getting the name of the project from the navigation items in the sidebar, and then inserting that in the cards on your board.

This means that if Asana changes their UI, this extension might break. Please file a support ticket if that appears to be the case.

You can find the source code here:
https://github.com/Lukasvo/asana-project-name-chrome-extension
